excerpt: A delicious and healthy breakfast alternative for vegans
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and chopped onion, and cook until onion is translucent.
Add diced red bell pepper and cook for another 2 minutes.
Crumble drained and pressed tofu into the pan, and mix with the vegetables.
Add turmeric, paprika, salt, and black pepper to the pan, and stir well.
Add chopped spinach to the pan, and cook until spinach is wilted.
